{{Server function}}

This function returns the current gravity for the specified [[/ped.md|ped]]. The default gravity is 0.008.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
float getPedGravity ( ped thePed )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/ped.md|ped]]:getGravity|gravity|setPedGravity}}

===Required Arguments===
*'''thePed:''' The [[/ped.md|ped]] whose gravity you want to check.

===Returns===
Returns a [[/float.md|float]] indicating the ped's gravity, or ''false'' if the ped is invalid. Default value is 0.008.

==Example==
This example outputs the gravity of the player who entered the 'showGravity' command.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function showGravity ( thePlayer )
	local gravity = getPedGravity ( thePlayer )
	outputChatBox ( "Your gravity: " .. tostring(gravity), thePlayer )
end
addCommandHandler ( "showGravity", showGravity )
</syntaxhighlight>
